text: Renate Lasker-Harpprecht (14 January 1924 â€“ 3 January 2021) was a German author and journalist. She survived the Holocaust, while being held at Auschwitz and Bergen-Belsen. She died in La Croix-Valmer on 3 January 2021 at the age of 96. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Holocaust survivors Category:German writers Category:German journalists
title: Renate Lasker-Harpprecht
